Meet hantera

09 Apr 2017

hantera is a tool which helps you manage projects which utilize a service oriented architecture.

Tasks which hantera can help you:

  • setting up a project and all itâ€™s dependencies on a machine for development
  • versioning and publishing of dependencies as well as whole applications
  • deployment of applications including their dependencies at specified versions
